about: I am a very determined, hardworking individual with an ability to solve problems and a skill to work with numbers obtained through various courses I have taken throughout the years. I am an alumnus of the Leaders' Quest programme offered by Life Choices, a part-time tutor at the IKamva Youth programme and currently enrolled on Life Choices Coding Academy for 12 months. As a result, I have been equipped with valuable experience in organising paperwork, administrating, leading, solving complex problems and mostly working with people through being a good communicator and a volunteer. My fascination with technology increased after I completed an information systems course at the University of Cape Town. Through this, I am interested in enhancing my experience and skills professionally by securing a position in the service/tech industry..

education.description: Matric exemption - Bachelor passes with 3 distinctions in Economics, Business Studies and Life Orientation.Top 10 of the best Business Studies and Economics Students in the Western Cape Province.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.experience: I have  experience in web development using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Javascript. I am still building applications using the mentioned technologies.

icons.title: Personal & Professional Development
icons.experience: I have completed a 2-year programme at Life Choice's Leaders' Quest, which has been carrying me since high school. I was introduced to more personal and professional skills when I was enrolled in Life Choices coding academy. Public speaking, Design thinking, etc.

icons.title: Tutoring
icons.experience: One of my goals is to become a professor for something I specialize in, I have been a tutor since high school in commercial subjects and through the IKamva Youth programme, I have been awarded excellence and appreciation for the impact I have on our youth and community

testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
testimonials.quotes: Natasha is a creative, and well-behaved individual who always prioritizes her work. She excels in collaborating and has gained proficiency in HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap. Including Git and GitHub

testimonials.name: Ntokozo Sithebe
testimonials.quotes: In the time that I have known her, Natasha Kapeyi has proven herself to be exceptional at whatever she sets out to do, she has a strong aptitude for coding and a deep passion for learning and discovering new skills

testimonials.name: Heather Mtuedwa
testimonials.quotes: What makes Natasha Kapeyi different from the rest is her unwavering commitment to excellence approaching every project with high professionalism and dedication. Her attention to detail and ability to work collaboratively makes her an invaluable member of any team

testimonials.name: Tashreeq Lee
testimonials.quotes: Natasha Kapeyi has a great work ethic and is always willing to go the extra mile to ensure the job is done right. She is a great problem solver and has an eye for detail that makes her stand out from the rest and also is highly organized, reliable, and always willing to lend a helping hand

testimonials.name: Andiswa Sinxo
testimonials.quotes: Natasha Zikhona is a very passionate and hard-working person that I know. She is eager to learn new things to explore her knowledge. Solving problems and being a team player are part of her soft skills. Her journey of becoming a Software Developer proves the fact that she is a problem solver and she can overcome any challenges that she faces

testimonials.name: Chuma Tshaka
testimonials.quotes: Natasha is a hard-working student who shows commitment and dedication to her studies. Despite hardships, she shows resilience and actively works towards her goals. This says a lot about her character and how she can bounce back from tough times
